descriptions: Collaborating with design team and developer to plan and prototype a website to showcase UNICEF’s initiatives and expand visibility beyond the SFU community
Working closely with board members to gather requirements and translate organizational goals into website features and content
Design and develop front-end using React and CSS to create a responsive web application that works across desktops, mobile, and other devices with an user-friendly interface
Ensure website design and functionality aligns with the club’s vision and information is up-to-date
Collaborate with Webmaster to integrate front-end code with server-side logic
Conduct one-on-one online programming sessions in Java or Scratch for neurodivergent children, adapting teaching methods to meet individual learning needs
Create progress sheets to track student progress and ensure consistency in teaching approaches
Implement individualized educational plans (IEPs), tailoring instruction to each student's unique strengths and challenges to provide a personalized learning environment
